title: Investigate the Suspicious Toys
content:
eads to the basement. There, you'll find a chest with a letter that initiates the quest "Investigate the Suspicious Toys."

Proceed south until you find "X:60 Y:-107." Speak with NPC Manip Nestor, and the quest "Investigating the Toys" will advance. Nestor will ask if you'd like to donate. Reply with:

Donations for what? It looks like you have plenty already. I'll take a donation, please. I'll make a donation - what do you need? I'm actually here to trade.

Opt for the first option, and Nestor
